product_name: Bring Your Adventure Sports Skyline Zipline - 90 ft.
long_description: The Bring Your Adventure Sports Skyline Zipline transforms your backyard into an adventure playground that the whole family can enjoy. Kit includes all the tools and equipment needed for a quick and easy installation by two adults; attach the zipline between two trees or other sturdy anchors. Easy-glide steel trolley has rubber-gripped handles for a secure ride along the high-quality 90 ft. long steel cable. Bring Your Adventure Sports Skyline Zipline is designed for ages 8 and older; supports up to 250 lbs.
short_description: The Bring Your Adventure Sports Skyline Zipline transforms your backyard into an adventure playground that the whole family can enjoy.
